DROP_DESCRIPTION: With this command you will be able to generate a set of 3 cards with randomized Gens. You can buy additional Drops from the "{{prefix}}shop" command with Wists, which you can obtain by Voting for Sofi
EXTRA_DROP_ALERT: {{author}} Your extra **Drop** is being used. You have **{{remaining}}** remaining
BUY_DROP: - You can also **Vote** to receive **Wists**! Use the command `{{prefix}}buy drop` to exchange them
WISHLIST_ALERT: A character from your wishlist is dropping! {{users}}
